entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
